item.title: Nancy Pelosi criticizes California AI bill as ‘ill-informed’
item.description: Congresswoman Nancy Pelosi issued a statement late yesterday laying out her opposition to SB 1047, a California bill that seeks to regulate AI. “The view of many of us in Congress is that SB 1047 is well-intentioned but ill-informed,” Pelosi said. item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp is ‘not going to apologize’ for military work

item.title: OpenAI’s new voice mode let me talk with my phone, not to it
